product_name: Icebreaker GT Technical 150 Relay Crew - Men's
long_description: Close-fitting and highly breathable for year-round wear, the Icebreaker GT Technical 150 Relay Crew Shirt for men uses merino wool to keep you comfortable during activity. Made of soft, non-irritating merino wool with a touch of spandex for stretch, this Icebreaker top dries quickly, wicks moisture and resists odors naturally. With a UPF rating of 50+, the shirt offers very good protection from UV light. Raglan sleeve construction allows unhindered shoulder movement. Flat seams reduce chafing; machine washable.
short_description: Close-fitting and highly breathable for year-round wear, the Icebreaker GT Technical 150 Relay Crew Shirt for men uses merino wool to keep you comfortable during activity.
